mapper.insert: insert into loa(loa_num,loa_start_date,loa_end_date,loa_cause,loa_appl_date,loa_appr_date,loa_appr_check,loa_rs_shcd_date,loa_stud,loa_admin) values((select lpad((select max(loa_num) from loa)+1,19,'0') from dual),#{loa_start_date},#{loa_end_date},#{loa_cause},sysdate,#{loa_appr_date},'0',#{loa_rs_shcd_date},#{loa_stud},#{loa_admin})
mapper.select:
SELECT LOA_START_DATE ,LOA_END_DATE ,LOA_RS_SHCD_DATE ,STUD_NUM ,STUD_NM ,DEPT_NM ,LOA_CAUSE ,LOA_APPL_DATE ,LOA_NUM ,MIN(LOA_APPL_DATE) as MIN_YR FROM LOA,DEPARTMENT,STUDENT WHERE LOA_STUD=STUD_NUM AND STUD_DEPT=DEPT_NUM
AND LOA_APPL_DATE LIKE SUBSTR(#{loa_appl_date},3,2)||'%'
GROUP BY LOA_START_DATE ,LOA_END_DATE ,LOA_RS_SHCD_DATE ,STUD_NUM ,STUD_NM ,DEPT_NM ,LOA_CAUSE ,LOA_APPL_DATE ,LOA_NUM
